data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Canaries that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Canaries, Saint Lucia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 383 believers in Canaries, Saint Lucia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Canaries, Saint Lucia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 1,610 people in the state of Canaries who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Canaries
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Canaries, Canaries, Saint Lucia.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Canaries, Saint Lucia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Canaries, Saint Lucia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Canaries, Saint Lucia has a population of 2,100.

We estimate Canaries has 383 people who might know Jesus, 1,610 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 107 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 383 believers in Canaries, Saint Lucia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
